com.untitled.game.animation

Class Animation<P extends java.lang.Enum>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.untitled.game.animation.Animation<P>
  • Type Parameters:
    P - a Part enum.

    public class Animation<P extends java.lang.Enum>
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages all the animations for a certain state, e.g Standing.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Copy constructor for Animation.
      Animation(com.badlogic.gdx.files.FileHandle handle, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,P> parts)
      Creates an animation with Textures and Hitboxes.
